meanings.definition: Stealing goods during a war or riot.
meanings.sent1: The looting of the store during the riot caused chaos.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested several individuals involved in the looting spree.
meanings.sent3: The looting of the candy aisle by the kids at the birthday party was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: The looting of resources from the land left it barren and desolate.
meanings.sent5: The looting of treasures from the ancient tomb was depicted in the movie with great detail.
